p: A mixture of the staring material (2 mmol), appropriate isocyanate/isothiocyanate (2.2 mmol), TEA (0.5 ml) in DCM (30 ml) was stirred at rt for 12 h. The solvent was evaporated, and the solid product was dissolved in chloroform-acetone (1:1). The formed precipitate was filtered, washed with acetone, and dried to give white amorphous solid product.
